review: I loved this streamer so much - until I started to notice that the streaming video has a motion stutter on all the applications and it drives me nuts.  I have tried restarting, I have tried different HDMI ports, and I have tried different televisions to rule out user error.  I also have fast internet and my apple tv and chrome cast do not have this problem.  So I love the interface and I love how it works - but if the processor can't stream fluid motion video without occasionally looking jerky and stuttering - the whole device is pointless.  I will happily update this review if some resolution becomes apparent.
